name: Hit Golf 3D
description:
One of the most unique golf game for your mobile devices!

This is not like mini golf nor real golf game, there are no rules in this golf game,
just adjust the angle, flick your finger and hit the ball into the hole.
Tap either left or right on the screen to aim the hole with a flag on it, flick across
the grassland and sandbox. Watch out bombs and other obstacles as the level goes up.

Swing your way through over 90 unique holes. Fun and unique gameplay with real physical engine.

Real golf physical engine!
Perfect combination of puzzle game and sport game!
Cool visual effects!
For all ages!

Haven't played golf in real life? Come and enjoy this one and create your own freestyle.
